title: Have You Heard- Jim Croce Live  DVD-V NTSC
description:
From Sidmal's  (paid for) collection

Product Description

This DVD is a rare collection of the best live concert and TV appearances of Croce's career. Culled from the archives of the classic 1970s variety shows, a new audience will have the chance to see and hear Croce perform live for the first time in 35 years. Included is commentary by Ingrid and A.J. Croce as well as bonus tracks and interviews.

Jim Croce had a fledgling career in the 70s as a folk-rock troubadour, before his life was cut cruelly short by a plane crash in 1973. This compilation of his television appearances illustrates his gift as a singer-songwriter, and includes many classic songs from his ouvre. Many of these songs have lain dormant in the archives since their original broadcast, so this should provide a real 

evelation for Croce fans everywhere. Tracks include "Bad, Bad Leroy Brown," "You Don't Mess Around With Jim," "New York's Not My Home," and many more
